ygData.subject: What server?
ygData.msgSnippet: Goodevening Ladies, I have been playing EQ on my PC for about a year. I am 43, mother of 3 grown kids and have always been a gamer. I also play EQ ~ PS2 as I
ygData.messageBody:
Goodevening Ladies,

I have been playing EQ on my PC for about a year. I am 43, mother of
3 grown kids and have always been a gamer. I also play EQ ~ PS2 as I
was involved in the beta on that one.

I often think the people I'm grouped with are all 14 or 15 only to
find out that I'm wrong and most of the group is my age let alone
there being a female in the bunch.

I too have built both of my PC's only because I couldnt really find
one that had what I wanted in it for less that and arm and a leg.
Nope not into tech in the real world, I'm a full time Paramedic~ so
I guess that's why I save lives one day and kill the next =)

I play on Brell and Torvonnilous ~ anyone here play on those??

I look forward to grouping with some of you

Q
